name: Niometrics
overview:
Niometrics is a Network Security company specializing in Network Traffic Analysis Solutions, specifically in the analysis and control of Layer-7 traffic, the application layer.

The company is known for its Nio Policy Enforcer (formerly known as NWOW) which features a protocol recognition engine that allows administrators to analyze network traffic and control the appropriate usage of applications within the network. An application discovery system constantly updates its detection capability of over 5500 applications, protocols and services.

In 2010, the company received the Asia Pacific Frost & Sullivan New Product Innovation Award for Network Traffic Analysis Solutions for its Nio series of products.

The company headquarters is located in Singapore.
